## Data setup

:::{.panel-tabset}

#### {{< fa server >}} PDC

Make an analysis directory `{{< meta exercise.dir >}}` and cd to it:

```bash
mkdir -p {{< meta exercise.dir >}} && cd {{< meta exercise.dir >}}
```

##### Using rsync

Use rsync to sync data to your analysis directory (hint: first use
options `-anv` to run the command without actually copying data):

```bash
# Run rsync -anv first time
rsync -av {{< var datasets.baseurl.pdc >}}/{{< meta exercise.data >}} .
```

##### Using pgip client

```bash
pgip exercises setup {{< meta exercise.venv >}}
```

#### {{< fa laptop >}} Local

Make an analysis directory `{{< meta exercise.dir >}}` and cd to it:

```bash
mkdir -p {{< meta exercise.dir >}} && cd {{< meta exercise.dir >}}
```

Then use wget to retrieve data to analysis directory.

```bash
wget -r -np -nH -N {{< meta exercise.wget_opts >}} \
     {{< var datasets.baseurl.url >}}/{{< meta exercise.data >}}
```

:::
